fields.name: createNew
fields.label: Create New Variant or Modify Existing

fields.tooltip: Provide path to the input CSV file
fields.label: Input CSV

fields.name: input_columns
fields.tooltip: Provide comma separated indexes of input columns
fields.label: Input Columns

fields.name: output_columns
fields.tooltip: Provide comma separated indexes of output columns
fields.label: Output Columns

fields.name: no_layers
fields.tooltip: Provide number of layers of the neural network
fields.label: Layers

fields.name: neurons
fields.tooltip: Provide number of neurons in each layer of the neural network
fields.label: Neurons

fields.name: activation_function
fields.tooltip: Select the activation function of each layer of the neural network
fields.label: Activation Function

fields.name: loss_function
fields.tooltip: Select the loss function of the neural network model
fields.label: Loss Function

fields.name: learning_rate
fields.tooltip: Provide the learning rate of the neural network model
fields.label: Learning Rate

fields.name: optimizer
fields.tooltip: Select the optimizer for the neural network model
fields.label: Optimizer

fields.name: metrics
fields.tooltip: Select the metrics for training neural network model
fields.label: Metrics

fields.name: train_fraction
fields.tooltip: Provide fraction of input data (0-1 float) to be used as training data
fields.label: Train Fraction

fields.name: d_split
fields.tooltip: Provide fraction of training data (0-1 float) to be used as validation data
fields.label: Validation Split
